changeSet.author: Serghei Luchianov
Jon Cairo
changeSet.comment: This code populates the vaccines table vaccines. CHanged date intervals to end of interval instead of middle.

changeSet.author: Mark Nicoll
changeSet.comment: This code adds two more entries for Albendazole for dose numbers 1 and 2.
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO `openmrs`.`vac_vaccines` ( `scheduled`, `name`, `indication_name`, `dose_number`, `dose`, `dosing_unit`, `route`, `creator`, `date_created`, `changed_by`, `date_changed`, `retired`, `retired_by`, `date_retired`, `retire_reason`, `uuid`, `numeric_indication`, `side_administered_left`, `body_site_administered`, `min_age`, `max_age` ) VALUES ( 0, 'Deworming - Albendazole', '2 years', 1, 400, '161553', '160240', 1, NOW(), null, null, 0, null, null, null, uuid(), 730, null, 'Mouth', 552, 731 );
INSERT INTO `openmrs`.`vac_vaccines` ( `scheduled`, `name`, `indication_name`, `dose_number`, `dose`, `dosing_unit`, `route`, `creator`, `date_created`, `changed_by`, `date_changed`, `retired`, `retired_by`, `date_retired`, `retire_reason`, `uuid`, `numeric_indication`, `side_administered_left`, `body_site_administered`, `min_age`, `max_age` ) VALUES ( 0, 'Deworming - Albendazole', '2 1/2 years', 2, 400, '161553', '160240', 1, NOW(), null, null, 0, null, null, null, uuid(), 913, null, 'Mouth', 731, 917 ); INSERT INTO `openmrs`.`vac_vaccines` ( `scheduled`, `name`, `indication_name`, `dose_number`, `dose`, `dosing_unit`, `route`, `creator`, `date_created`, `changed_by`, `date_changed`, `retired`, `retired_by`, `date_retired`, `retire_reason`, `uuid`, `numeric_indication`, `side_administered_left`, `body_site_administered`, `min_age`, `max_age` ) VALUES ( 0, 'Hepatitis B (HA)', null, null, null, null, null, 1, NOW(), null, null, 0, null, null, null, uuid(), null, null, null, 42, 98 ); Update vac_vaccines set name = 'Hepatitis B (HB)' where name = 'Hepatitis B (HA)';

changeSet.author: Mark Nicoll
changeSet.comment: deletes duplicate rows in vac_vaccine table
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM vac_vaccines WHERE vaccine_id NOT IN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT MIN(n.vaccine_id) FROM vac_vaccines n GROUP BY n.name,n.dose_number) x);

changeSet.author: Falon Scheers
changeSet.comment: BUGFIX: swaps the min and max values for indication dates of vaccines with one date and set max to 0 as flag

changeSet.author: Mark Nicoll
changeSet.comment: BUGFIX: make the to administer date value consistant for Bacillus Calmette-Guerin BCG seccond dose
